content:
IWithDataDiskImage Interface

Definition

The stage of an image definition allowing to add data disk image.

In this Article

public interface IWithDataDiskImage

Methods

DefineDataDiskImage()

Gets Begins the definition of a new data disk image to add to the image. The definition must be completed with a call to CustomImageDataDisk.DefinitionStages.WithAttach.attach().
WithDataDiskImageFromManagedDisk(String)

Adds a data disk image with source as managed disk.
WithDataDiskImageFromSnapshot(String)

Adds a data disk image with source as snapshot.
WithDataDiskImageFromVhd(String)

Adds a data disk image with source as a virtual hard disk.
